metadata.title: Alberta labour force profiles
metadata.creator: Alberta. Alberta Employment, Immigration and Industry
metadata.publisher: Edmonton, Alta. : Alberta Employment, Immigration and Industry
metadata.description: 2007 edition released in 2008 by Alberta Employment and Immigration was split into 4 separate titles: Alberta profiles: aboriginals in the labour force, Alberta profiles: older workers in the labour force, Alberta profiles: women in the labour force and Alberta profiles: youth in the labour force

Provides labour market information on five segments of Alberta's labour force which will contribute to the full utilization of skills of all Albertans, older workers, women, youth, aboriginal people and immigrants
System requirements for online access: Adobe Acrobat
Mode of access: World Wide Web
Alberta Government Library: locally printed copies
metadata.notes: No title page found. No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found.
